name: Cambodia
first_match: There is no Official Matches played in Cambodia since 2012
first_t20: Cambodia to host its first international Tennis Cricket and Para Cricket Tournament dedicated to its Prime Minister Samdech Hun Sen "Samdech Hun Sen Asia Peace Cup 2022 in Nov 2022. This is the first international event hosted by Cambodia in history of Cricket of Cambodia
most_recent_t20i: Recently, Cricket Federation Cambodia Association (CFCA) organised first official T-15 Tennis cricket Series on 26–27 March 2022
